# Movie Discovery App From HNG STage Two

![Movie Discovery App](data:image/png;base64,)

>  A movie discovery web application that allows users to search for movies, view details about them, and highlight their favorite movies.

## Demo

https://glory995.github.io/HNGStageTwoTask/


## Features
List the top 10 movies on the homepage.
With the date added and other features 
Allow higlidhting of favourite movie 
see details about the movie

## Getting Started
create your react project 
build a nice nice
run it 

### Prerequisites

- Node.js and npm installed on your development machine.
- REact icons
- Google icons

## API Integration
I was able to integrate the TMDB movie API and also the top rated and the details api



## Error Handling
I was able to use Axios to handle errors , try and catch 

## Deployment
Wanna see how i deploy check out   https://github.com/gitname/react-gh-pages

## Contributing
If you'd like to contribute to this project, please follow me on github, instagram and twitter
